Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a light-brown pottery vessel, fabric is grey in section, exterior covered with a cream-coloured slip and remains of one line of black-painted hieratic text identifying contents.
Curator's comments: Peet & Woolley, City of Akhenaten I. Pl. LXIV fig. 71
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393200) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393200)
